response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to both us and you, amounting to $1,500,000. Considering its unparalleled quality and the benefits it offers, we are excited to extend an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you for $1,400,000, a special discount designed to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your financial planning and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1400000}
